name: China
description: Study in one of the world's fastest-growing economies with a rich cultural heritage spanning 5,000 years. China offers world-class education, cutting-edge research facilities, and incredible career opportunities.

whyStudyHere.title: World-Class Universities
whyStudyHere.description: Home to 50+ universities ranked in the global top 500, offering programs in English across all fields.

whyStudyHere.title: Affordable Education
whyStudyHere.description: Significantly lower tuition fees compared to Western countries, with generous scholarship opportunities.

whyStudyHere.title: Cultural Experience
whyStudyHere.description: Immerse yourself in one of the world's oldest civilizations while studying in modern, cosmopolitan cities.

whyStudyHere.title: Career Opportunities
whyStudyHere.description: Access to one of the world's largest job markets and multinational companies operating in China.

topUniversities: University of Science and Technology of China
admissionRequirements: High school diploma or equivalent for undergraduate
studentLife: Modern campus facilities with sports complexes
Rich cultural festivals and events year-round
Safe and welcoming environment for international students

name: Hungary
description: Experience world-class education in the heart of Europe. Hungary offers affordable tuition, EU recognition, and a perfect blend of historic charm and modern innovation.

whyStudyHere.title: EU Member Benefits
whyStudyHere.description: Degrees recognized across the European Union, opening doors to careers throughout Europe.

whyStudyHere.title: Affordable Living
whyStudyHere.description: One of the most affordable countries in Europe with excellent quality of life.

whyStudyHere.title: Strategic Location
whyStudyHere.description: Located in Central Europe, perfect for exploring neighboring countries and cultures.

whyStudyHere.title: Medical Education Hub
whyStudyHere.description: Renowned for medical programs with modern facilities and experienced faculty.

scholarships.name: Stipendium Hungaricum
scholarships.eligibility: All degree levels from partner countries

topUniversities: Budapest University of Technology and Economics
admissionRequirements: Secondary school leaving certificate for undergraduate
studentLife: Rich cultural heritage with historic architecture
Famous thermal baths and spa culture

name: Italy
description: Study in the birthplace of the Renaissance. Italy combines centuries of academic tradition with cutting-edge research, offering an unparalleled educational and cultural experience.

whyStudyHere.title: Historic Universities
whyStudyHere.description: Home to some of the world's oldest universities, including the University of Bologna (founded 1088).

whyStudyHere.title: Art & Design Capital
whyStudyHere.description: World leader in fashion, design, architecture, and arts - perfect for creative fields.

whyStudyHere.title: Mediterranean Lifestyle
whyStudyHere.description: Enjoy the famous Italian lifestyle, cuisine, and culture while studying.

whyStudyHere.title: EU Education Standards
whyStudyHere.description: High-quality education with degrees recognized across Europe and globally.

studentLife: Rich artistic and cultural heritage everywhere
Beautiful landscapes from Alps to Mediterranean
Student discounts on museums and cultural sites

fastFacts.visaRequired: Yes (Type D Student Visa for non-EU)
